pkgmetadata.longdescription: Python 3 modules for accessing .dbf files------------------------------------------Port to Python 3 and released at PyPi by Frank Xu.### Features* Support FoxPro* Support memo* Code page### TODO* Write test* dBase compatible### InstallRun `pip install dbfpy3`---### NOT FULLY TEST YET### USE AT YOUR OWN RISK### NO WARRANTIES WHATSOEVER---steelywing <https://github.com/steelywing/dbfpy>Jeff Kunce <kuncej@mail.conservation.state.mo.us>Hans Fiby <hans@fiby.at>Frank Xu <https://github.com/frankyxhl/dbfpy3>Zdeněk Böhm <https://github.com/zbohm>=======History=======0.1.0 (2020-12-26)------------------* First release on PyPI.
